title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 29.17 - Special provisions for the profession of physical therapy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 29.17 - Special provisions for the profession of physical therapy

State Regulations

Unprofessional conduct in the practice of physical therapy
shall include conduct prohibited by sections
29.1
and
29.2
of this Part. In addition, unprofessional conduct in the practice of physical therapy shall include
failing to meet the requirements of section
6731
(d) of the Education Law and/or section
77.9
of this Title, when providing
treatment in the practice of physical therapy without a referral from a
physician, dentist, podiatrist, or nurse practitioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
29.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
